page.title: 08OCCUPATIONS
page.content: The results of our questionnaire proved to us that the majority of people living in our D_block were retired. The number of retired people came to 110 out of 320. Compared to this,there were very few unemployed,only 6. Also there were not as many working on the land,as I expected,just 35. Of cottage industries such as knitting and candle_making,there were 4. There were many housewives,49 in all. Among workers,omitting farmers,there were most people in the skilled category,but only 9 unskilled and 8 proffessional. Only one person was actively involved in the Forces. Alice Hackett,11.
